entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Calgary (Olympic Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.6°C

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 8 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 8 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
